properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ding, Dong!
Merrily on high in heaven
the bells are ringing.
Ding, Dong!
Verily the sky is riv'n
with angels singing.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Gloria! Hosanna in excelsis.
Gloria! Hosanna in excelsis.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
E'ven so he below, below,
Let steeple bells be swungen,
and oi, oi, oi, by priest
and people sungen.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Pray you, dutifully prime,
your matin chime ye ringers;
May you beautifully rime
Your evetime song ye singers.
